name: XTrem-FreeStyle 2
description:
Travel to sumptuous places!
Breathtaking acrobatics and even more thrills await you!
Challenge the gravity and try to make the most dangerous acrobatics and avoid the fall!

Launch you in tunnels of sand, lava, ice and many others ...

Customize your XTrem-Bike and your driver!

A "Tuto" mode allows you to learn how to master your XTrem-Bike.

Many options will allow you to:
• Set the Accelerometer's Sensitivity or enable the Virtual-Pad to control your XTrem-Bike.
• Select the Difficulty Level: "Beginner", "Expert" or "Pilot".
• Select the Camera: "Outside" or "Inside".
• Enable or Disable Music.
• Set the Graphic Quality.
• Enable or Disable Special Effects.

The score of each race is recorded.
You can share your scores and see your position in the world leaderboard.

Will you dare to try the Impossible ...?

••• Game Features •••

• Optimized for Tablets and Smartphones!
• Drive incredible XTrem-Bike!
• Breathtaking acrobatics!
• Chills and thrills guaranteed!
• Full 3D Realtime Rendering!
• Impressive and High graphic and animation Quality!
